name: Crash in Time: Waiting for Tim
name_original: Crash in Time: Waiting for Tim
description:
Crash in Time is a 2d platform game where the hero travels over the time to save the world from villain Dr. Chrono! The player controls Tim, a young boy who has many powers related to timespace manipulation.

You are a time fixer: your work is travel on the spacetime to collect and fix all the time paradox created after the lab accident.

Jumps from one era to another: each world of the platformer is different from the other because it features a different historical period. Your goal is to restore the original spatiotemporal stream

You can play with keyboards, or joystick controller :)

n00b cheat: press n+0+b on the title menu to get 99 lives and full levels unlocked.




Made by OutGame at Politecnico di Milano
